mapper.select:
SELECT id, sxzfq_name, sxpl_value, bpqpl_value, zpl_value, xxpl_value, system_name, tzsl_value, xxsl_value, tzfs_name, xdbm_code, xzb_value, DATE_FORMAT(build_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as buildDate, position_code, pro_code, user_no FROM wlsms_auto_manual where 1=1
and (sxzfq_name like concat('%',#{queryBt},'%') or system_name like concat('%',#{queryBt},'%') or pro_code like concat('%',#{queryBt},'%'))
and DATE_FORMAT(build_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(build_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and pro_code = #{proCodeManual}
order by id desc

SELECT id, wx_name, zpl_value, dpl_value, tkpl_value, xh_type, msl_value, DATE_FORMAT(build_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as buildTime, zzb_value, tzys_name, bm_type, ml_name, position_code, pro_code, user_no FROM wlsms_auto_machine where 1=1
and (wx_name like concat('%',#{queryBt},'%') or tzys_name like concat('%',#{queryBt},'%') or pro_code like concat('%',#{queryBt},'%'))
and DATE_FORMAT(build_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(build_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and pro_code = #{proCodeMachine}
order by id desc
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO wlsms_auto_manual
sxzfq_name, sxpl_value, bpqpl_value, zpl_value, xxpl_value, system_name, tzsl_value, xxsl_value, tzfs_name, xdbm_code, xzb_value, build_date, position_code, pro_code, user_no, create_time, edit_time,
#{sxzfqName}, #{sxplValue}, #{bpqplValue}, #{zplValue}, #{xxplValue}, #{systemName}, #{tzslValue}, #{xxslValue}, #{tzfsName}, #{xdbmCode}, #{xzbValue}, #{buildDate}, #{positionCode}, #{proCode}, #{userNo}, now(), now()

INSERT INTO wlsms_auto_manual ( sxzfq_name, sxpl_value, bpqpl_value, zpl_value, xxpl_value, system_name, tzsl_value, xxsl_value, tzfs_name, xdbm_code, xzb_value, build_date, position_code, pro_code, user_no, create_time, edit_time ) VALUES
( #{item.sxzfqName}, #{item.sxplValue}, #{item.bpqplValue}, #{item.zplValue}, #{item.xxplValue}, #{item.systemName}, #{item.tzslValue}, #{item.xxslValue}, #{item.tzfsName}, #{item.xdbmCode}, #{item.xzbValue}, #{item.buildDate}, #{item.positionCode}, #{item.proCode}, #{item.userNo}, now(), now() )

INSERT INTO wlsms_auto_manual ( wx_name, zpl_value, dpl_value, tkpl_value, xh_type, msl_value, zzb_value, tzys_name, bm_type, ml_name, build_time, position_code, pro_code, user_no, create_time, edit_time ) VALUES ( #{wxName}, #{zplValue}, #{dplValue}, #{tkplValue}, #{xhType}, #{mslValue}, #{zzbValue}, #{tzysName}, #{bmType}, #{mlName}, #{buildTime}, #{positionCode}, #{proCode}, #{userNo}, now(), now() )

INSERT INTO wlsms_auto_machine ( wx_name, zpl_value, dpl_value, tkpl_value, xh_type, msl_value, zzb_value, tzys_name, bm_type, ml_name, build_time, position_code, pro_code, user_no, create_time, edit_time ) VALUES
( #{item.wxName}, #{item.zplValue}, #{item.dplValue}, #{item.tkplValue}, #{item.xhType}, #{item.mslValue}, #{item.zzbValue}, #{item.tzysName}, #{item.bmType}, #{item.mlName}, #{item.buildTime}, #{item.positionCode}, #{item.proCode}, #{item.userNo}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: select DATE_FORMAT(build_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as buildDate, count(id) as count from wlsms_auto_manual where 1=1 and DATE_FORMAT(build_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{buildDate},'%Y-%m-%d') group by build_date order by build_date desc

select DATE_FORMAT(build_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as buildTime, count(id) as count from wlsms_auto_machine where 1=1 and DATE_FORMAT(build_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{buildDate},'%Y-%m-%d') group by build_time order by build_time desc

select id, DATE_FORMAT(build_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as buildDate, DATE_FORMAT(build_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as buildTime, remark, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as createTime, DATE_FORMAT(edit_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as editTime from wlsms_auto_build where 1=1
and remark like concat('%',#{queryBt},'%')
and ( DATE_FORMAT(build_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{buildDate},'%Y-%m-%d') or DATE_FORMAT(build_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{buildDate},'%Y-%m-%d')) order by build_time desc

select id, xxpl_value as xxplValue, tkpl_value as tkplValue, xtd_value as xtdValue, system_name as systemName, xh_type as xhType, tzsl_value as tzslValue, msl_value as mslValue, tzd_value as tzdValue, tzfs_name as tzfsName, tzys_name as tzysName, xdbm_code as xdbmCode, bm_type as bmType, ml_name as mlName, xzb_value as xzbValue, zzb_value as zzbValue, user_no as userNo, DATE_FORMAT(build_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as buildDate, DATE_FORMAT(build_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as buildTime, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as createTime, DATE_FORMAT(edit_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as editTime from wlsms_auto_data where 1=1 and DATE_FORMAT(build_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{buildDate},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(build_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') = DATE_FORMAT(#{buildTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') order by build_time desc
select DATE_FORMAT(build_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as buildDate from wlsms_auto_manual where 1=1 group by build_date order by build_date desc limit 0,1

SELECT id, sxzfq_name, sxpl_value, bpqpl_value, zpl_value, xxpl_value, system_name, tzsl_value, xxsl_value, tzfs_name, xdbm_code, xzb_value, DATE_FORMAT(build_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as buildDate, position_code, pro_code, user_no FROM wlsms_auto_manual where 1=1 and DATE_FORMAT(build_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{buildDate},'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT id, wx_name, zpl_value, dpl_value, tkpl_value, xh_type, msl_value, DATE_FORMAT(build_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as buildTime, zzb_value, tzys_name, bm_type, ml_name, position_code, pro_code, user_no FROM wlsms_auto_machine where 1=1 and DATE_FORMAT(build_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') = DATE_FORMAT(#{buildTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
select param_value as paramValue from admin_parameters where param_type = '阀值'

select count(*) from wlsms_auto_build where DATE_FORMAT(build_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{buildDate},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(build_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') = DATE_FORMAT(#{buildTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
mapper.update: update wlsms_auto_build set edit_time = now() where DATE_FORMAT(build_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{buildDate},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(build_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') = DATE_FORMAT(#{buildTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
mapper.insert: insert into wlsms_auto_build ( build_date, build_time, remark, create_time, edit_time )values ( #{buildDate}, #{buildTime}, #{remark}, now(), now() )

INSERT INTO wlsms_auto_data ( xxpl_value, tkpl_value, xtd_value, system_name, xh_type, tzsl_value, msl_value, tzd_value, tzfs_name, tzys_name, xdbm_code, bm_type, ml_name, xzb_value, zzb_value, user_no, build_date, build_time, create_time, edit_time ) VALUES
( #{item.xxplValue}, #{item.tkplValue}, #{item.xtdValue}, #{item.systemName}, #{item.xhType}, #{item.tzslValue}, #{item.mslValue}, #{item.tzdValue}, #{item.tzfsName}, #{item.tzysName}, #{item.xdbmCode}, #{item.bmType}, #{item.mlName}, #{item.xzbValue}, #{item.zzbValue}, 'admin', #{item.buildDate}, #{item.buildTime}, now(), now() )
mapper.delete: delete from wlsms_auto_data where DATE_FORMAT(build_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{buildDate},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(build_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') = DATE_FORMAT(#{buildTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
mapper.select: select id, DATE_FORMAT(build_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as buildDate, DATE_FORMAT(build_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as buildTime, remark, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as createTime, DATE_FORMAT(edit_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as editTime from wlsms_auto_build where id = #{id}
